pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modeling Correlational Magnitude Transformations in Discretization Contexts // Modeling the correlation transitions under specified distributional assumptions within the realm of discretization in the context of the latency and threshold concepts. The details of the method are explained in Demirtas, H. and Vardar-Acar, C. (2017) DOI:10.1007/978-981-10-3307-0_4.
